elements.title: Michael Shanks (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that before Michael Shanks (pictured) became Member of Parliament for Rutherglen and Hamilton West, he ran along all of Glasgow's 6,143 streets?

elements.title: his Trump Tower penthouse (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when asked how many rooms his Trump Tower penthouse had, Donald Trump replied: "However many they will print"?

elements.title: Seraphina Sforza (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Blessed Seraphina Sforza was implicated in a murder plot at the age of twelve?

elements.title: Mural (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Julie Mehretu's Mural, installed at 200 West Street in New York City, was painted using 215 different colors?

elements.title: Chet Winters (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that for all of his years in college, future NFL running back Chet Winters had little chance to rush the ball due to a different player taking priority every year?

elements.title: 1916–1917 northern Minnesota lumber strike (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that during the 1916–1917 northern Minnesota lumber strike, multiple cities in Minnesota banned members of the Industrial Workers of the World from their municipalities?

elements.title: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Android version of Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective is now lost media?

elements.title: a roundworm (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in June 2022, a neurosurgeon found a roundworm in someone's brain?
